effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
